aboutSubtitle: Your Trusted Partner in Real Estate
aboutMission1: Bozhidar Estate is a leading real estate agency specializing in helping clients buy and sell properties in the most desirable neighborhoods. Our team of experienced agents is dedicated to providing exceptional service and making the buying and selling process as smooth as possible.
aboutMission2: Our mission is to help our clients achieve their real estate goals by providing expert advice, personalized service, and a deep understanding of the local market. Whether you're looking to buy or sell a property, we're here to assist you every step of the way.
aboutMission3: Our team of agents has extensive experience and knowledge in the real estate industry, and we're committed to providing the highest level of service to our clients. We believe that buying or selling a property should be an exciting and rewarding experience, and we're dedicated to making it a reality for each of our clients.

introductionContent: Welcome to Bozhidar Estate. These Terms and Conditions govern the use of our website and services. By accessing or using our website, you agree to comply with and be bound by these terms.
intellectualPropertyRightsContent: All content on this website, including text, graphics, logos, and images, is the property of Bozhidar Estate and is protected by applicable copyright and trademark laws.
userObligationsContent: You agree to use our website only for lawful purposes. You must not use our website in a way that causes or may cause damage to the website or impair its accessibility.
limitationOfLiabilityContent: Bozhidar Estate shall not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising from your use or inability to use our website or services.
changesToTermsContent: We reserve the right to modify these Terms and Conditions at any time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new terms on our website. By continuing to use the website after the changes have been posted, you accept those changes.
contactUsContent: If you have any questions about these Terms and Conditions, please contact us at info@example.com.
